description:
If you’re reading this, you're probably looking for fun games you can play during school or at work that aren't blocked by the internet filter. Whether you need a quick break or just want to slack off a bit, unblocked games are a perfect solution.

Top 15 Unblocked Games You Can Play At School or Work

This guide covers the top unblocked games you can access from any browser without having to download anything.

The Top 15 Unblocked Games:

1. Krunker - A fun first person shooter game you can play right in your browser. 2. SSO Cricket - A flash-based cricket game that’s perfect for a quick match. 3. Smash-The-Spam - A simple but addictive game where you smash spam emails. 4. Dragnocorn - Guide a drgnocorn through gates to collect gems in this fun arcade game. 5. 2048 - The classic block-merging puzzle game that’s simple and challenging. 6. Armored Fight - An intense tank battle game with lots of power-ups and upgrades. 7. Little Balls - Guide a ball through various obstacles courses in this physics game. 8. Snake - The original game where you control a snake and eat apples to grow longer. 9. Ball Clicker - An auto clicking balls game that gets faster and more challenging over time. 10. Diep.io - A slio shaping multiplayer tank combat game. 11. Sushi Cat 2 - Help the sushi cat collect as many sushis as possible in this platformer. 12. Duck Life - A fun cartoon duck simulator where you raise your own duck. 13. Tetris.com - The original classic block-stacking puzzle game. 14. Scribble.io - Draw and guess drawings with other players online in real time. 15. Splix.io - A fun mashup of Tetris and Snake where you drop falling blocks.
name: games that are not blocked
